casebody.data:
744 A.2d 548 ATTORNEY GRIEVANCE COMMISSION OF MARYLAND, Petitioner, v. Gerald Stephan SUSMAN, Respondent. Misc. (Subtitle AG) No. 48,

Sept. Term, 1999.

Court of Appeals of Maryland. Jan. 14, 2000.

ORDER

This matter came before the Court on Joint Petition of the Attorney Grievance Commission of Maryland and Respondent to suspend the Respondent by consent. Upon consideration of said Petition, it is this 14th day of January, 2000,

ORDERED, that the Respondent, Gerald S. Susman, be and he is hereby suspended from the practice of law in the State of Maryland, effective immediately; and it is further

ORDERED, that the Clerk of this Court shall remove the name of Gerald S. Susman from the register of attorneys in this Court and certify that fact to the Clients’ Security Trust Fund and the Clerks of all the judicial tribunals in this State in accordance with Maryland Rule 16-713.
